TopicTitle: Mod Request: Add Text Headings to the Techtree Page

Articles.Content:
A picture says a thousand words:

All it would do is let the modder/player add text to the tech tree page/background from a config file.  Doesn't even need a UI if that would be more than you would want to take on.  

Essentially I just want to show what each tech tree branch is...  Thermodynamics, Computers, Nuclear, etc... Not necessarily the node name.
The ability to change the background image,  to something  like color coded channels or really anything besides a black grid could be really nice too.
